name: Room Swap
description:
This game was made for the second Alakajam! game jam, with the themes being. "You can't see everything". The way this game works is, you can switch between two viewing modes, I guess. Blue mode, and Orange mode to reveal different platforms and such. You can only stay in orange mode for a certain amount of time before dying, so be careful!

It'll probably make more sense if you just try it out. O_o

Also, there isn't really much of an ending, I'll probably add that after the jam, when I tweak the levels and stuff. :-)
